```{r}
library(devtools)
library("ggmap")
devtools::install_github("dkahle/ggmap", ref = "tidyup", force=TRUE)

#Set your API Key
```

```{r}
MSB <- geocode("1000 Pope Rd, Honolulu, Hawaii")
get_map(location = c(lon = MSB$lon, lat = MSB$lat),
        zoom = 12) %>%
  ggmap() +
  geom_point(aes(x = MSB$lon, y = MSB$lat))
```
